title: Cheese spread

ingredients.content: ½ - 1 tsp non-iodised salt, to taste (see Tips)

preparations.content: Place quark, bicarbonate of soda and salt into mixing bowl and knead <b>30 sec/<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add egg and cook <b>25 min/60°C/speed 3<b>. Transfer into a sealable container and cool to room temperature, then store in the refrigerator until ready to serve (see Tips).

hintsAndTricks: We highly recommend using homemade quark (please refer to the Quark recipe in this collection). Using store-bought quark or ricotta may not produce a successful outcome.
You can find non-iodised salt at most major supermarkets. You can replace the salt with Vegetable or Chicken stock paste in this recipe for added flavour.
You can store this cheese spread in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.
